extendedInfo.description: Special Fx Camera (Ad free and pro version) Do you ever ask yourself how they made all this special effects in the Hollywood movies and in the special photo studios? The answer is simple, "green or blue screen" is the secret of this magic after that are involve expensive computers, allot digital work,big teams and many hours work. Until Now. Now you have the chance to do all this for no time and absolutely professional with Special Fx Camera. All you need is this app, develop your fantasy and follow couple of ease steps. Step 1: Open the panel with the imported from us photo effects Step 2: Select the desired photo effect Step 3: Press button "Done" Step 4: Select the color picker from the tools menuStep 5: Point your camera and press the screen to select color for the effectStep 6: Set the tolerance from the sliderStep 7: Take picture and share it with your friends via Facebook, Skype, Picasa, Gmail, Twitter, Bluetooth, Viber, Flipboard, Google+, Quick Send, Wi-Fi Direct, NFC Tapping, Hangouts and more. With the real time camera image processing you will see the final result immediately.WYSIWYG (What You See Is What You Get) camera effects.You can find  our Help tutorial,directing you Step By Step how to create your first picture with applied special effect.The Help button is located on the tools panelCompare with the rest real time camera applications in Special Fx Camera you ain't depend from the someone else creativity. You can integrate any pictures and turn them into special effect, this option is given you complete freedom of your creativity and fantasy. For example: Search in Google images for fire effect picture, save it on your phone open Special Fx Camera and from the Custom Fx panel just add the saved picture then choose it and applied.With special effect camera you can even tuning your car (see the screenshots for example)Make professional special effect with your Androidâ¢ camera or just impress your friends with amazing photos. ****** Video review by GiveMeApps https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yKkL5jHVQlQ  ******What are the differences from the free version?1. reviews.title: Fantastic, cool and fun
reviews.comment: Love this camera.  It is like you have a special effects studio in your hand.  Works really well on my Asus infinity tablet TF700T.  You can use stock special effects or create your own using your camera, pic from your gallery or pic you downloaded off the internet saved in your gallery.  So much fun and creativity all rolled into one little app.  This app ROCKS!!!!!!   Thanks developer for coming out with ad free version like I requested - much appreciated.  Tested out app in my Samsung galaxy 4.0 player and it works fine in that device as well.:-)
reviews.author: Toni Cz
